body_html:
Thanks @sharvil. I quickly try the snippet and was able to reproduce the issue with tf-nightly-gpu binary. Interestingly, the issue is only produced on GPU version, but not tf CPU binary, which I suspect has something to do with the GPU ops.

Will need some time to dig more for details.

body:
Thanks @sharvil. I quickly try the snippet and was able to reproduce the issue with tf-nightly-gpu binary. Interestingly, the issue is only produced on GPU version, but not tf CPU binary, which I suspect has something to do with the GPU ops. 

Will need some time to dig more for details.
